name: Robert E. TOLL, Appellant, v. Norma TOLL

judges: Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Robert E. TOLL, Appellant, v. Norma TOLL.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition for Allowance of Appeal granted. Order of the Superior Court affirmed. 293 Pa.Super. 549, 439 A.2d 712 (1981).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Parker H. Wilson, Norristown, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
448 A.2d 1379
Robert E. TOLL, Appellant, v. Norma TOLL.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 13, 1982.
Albert Momjian, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
Parker H. Wilson, Norristown, for respondent.
Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
